title: sagarbansal21
author: sagarbansal21
content: Are you an artist who has a passion for art?If your answer is YES, then AdLunam is giving you a chance to show your skills and win some exciting prizes.Rewards Pool: $1,000Learn more details here: https://medium.com/adlunam-inc/calling-all-artists-a-whopping-1000-prize-pool-and-tons-of-community-buzz-await-you-6bf2b71ff1a0

comments.author: sagarbansal21
comments.body: No, this is your chance to showcase your passion for winning some exciting rewards. Steps to Participating in a prize pool of $1,000: - Fill in the following form: https://t.co/rTeqU4Drz3 - Followed by Uploading your Artwork on a Tweet - Tweet this Artwork which includes the story about the Artwork, with a tag to @AdLunamInc and #NonFungibleTalent If you need any help, do join here: Discord: https://discord.gg/adlunamTelegram: https://t.me/adlunamtalents
